title: fix copy/paste in solr/contrib/ltr/pom.xml.template
description:
In dev-tools/maven/solr/contrib/ltr/pom.xml.template turn a few analytics bits into ltr essentially.

Randomly noticed on http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.solr/solr-ltr entry.

comments.content: Attaching patch, proposed for inclusion in 6.4.2 release, after review.
comments.author: Christine Poerschke
